About me

I'm an front-end developer from Slovenia. With knowledge in HTML5, CSS3, Bootstrap, Materialize CSS, JavaScript and JavaScript framework React. My plan is to code every day for atleast 2 hours and learn something new every day. I am a great beliver in hard work. I also like reading books.


Favorite qoute:
“At some point it comes down to who can handle the boredom of training every day, doing the same lifts over and over and over. ”

James Clear from Atomic Habits
